actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE public."patch_registered_details" SET
		"hostname" = '{{update_form.fieldState.hostname.isVisible ? update_form.formData.hostname : update_form.sourceData.hostname}}',
		"task_trigger" = '{{update_form.fieldState.task_trigger.isVisible ? update_form.formData.task_trigger : update_form.sourceData.task_trigger}}',
    "registered_on" = '{{update_form.fieldState.registered_on.isVisible ? update_form.formData.registered_on : update_form.sourceData.registered_on}}',
		"registered_time" = '{{update_form.fieldState.registered_time.isVisible ? update_form.formData.registered_time : update_form.sourceData.registered_time}}'
WHERE "os_version" = {{data_table.selectedRow.os_version}};
